attributes.action: Make the m8 motorway into 3 lanes frome newhouse to hermiston gait
attributes.additional_details: Extreme traffic congestion, breakdowns, and drivers who don't know the rules of the road cause this road to be one of the slowest roads to travel on for being a key road to both city centres
attributes.background:
The m8 is by far one of the worste motorways for congestion in Scotland if not the worste,
It is also one the busiest and main road in and of of Edinburgh/Glasgow withan avarage waiting time of 30+ minutes stuck in traffic.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
